snippet.title: 3 Days: Zoo Mystery  - an awesome Hidden Object game
snippet.description:
http://realore.com/games/3days
New Hidden Object game 3 Days: Zoo Mystery from Realore Studios will plunge you in a mysterious detective stories' atmosphere. Play 3 Days: Zoo Mystery and find a stolen property, solve the enigmatic riddle and expose the villain with beautiful young Anna! You have only 3 days to unravel this complicated story, solve an old zoo mystery and help Anna and her uncle. Stop looking for a fascinating and dangerous adventure! It's already found you! Welcome to Three Days: Zoo Mystery! Download 3 Days: Zoo Mystery for free on PC, soon it will be also available for MAC and online.
